channel.title: CRASH: Killing the helicopter
channel.description: I've just got the RPG and the helicopter has appeared. When I kill it, the game crashes. I've tried killing it with the Tau cannon and with the RPG. The game crashes when I deliver the fatal blow (or at least I assume it's the killing strike, as it's smoking/on fire etc, but the game crashes before it actually goes in to crashing mode etc). I have uploaded all three crash dumps from my 'source sdk base 2007' folder to this post. EDIT: I repeatedly tried it again and was eventually able to do it. EDIT 2: I forgot to mention that it also sometimes crashed when I died during the battle (it could be just me, but it seemed it crashed most often if I killed myself with the RPG). On a related note, when I was directing a fired missile with the RPG, if I moved the red dot over a rock I was crouched right behind, the rocket seemed to appear directly in front of me instantly and spasm around wildly before eventually exploding in what I guess would have been the normal time for it to actually fly from where it was to where I was. I hope this helps. hl2_4104_crash_2012_9_17T19_0_53C0.mdmp (96.3 KB) hl2_4104_crash_2012_9_17T19_2_58C0.mdmp (101 KB) hl2_4104_crash_2012_9_17T19_6_44C0.mdmp (98.9 KB)

Awesomeness!:

Same thing happened to me. The game crashes every single time i destroy the chopper.

Same thing happened to me too. Either when I die or when it dies

Read full topic

item.title: CRASH: Killing the helicopter
item.dc:creator: _amp_gt_origami_amp
item.description:
I’ve had two crashes (and the only two so far!) both on this cliff level.
Once when firing a grenade at a soldier. (The game crashed after the grenade impacted)
And the second crash occurred after a missile from the rpg hit the helicopter.
Apart from this the game has run flawlessly so far.

Read full topic

item.title: CRASH: Killing the helicopter
item.dc:creator: Metritutus
item.description:
I’ve just got the RPG and the helicopter has appeared. When I kill it, the game crashes. I’ve tried killing it with the Tau cannon and with the RPG. The game crashes when I deliver the fatal blow (or at least I assume it’s the killing strike, as it’s smoking/on fire etc, but the game crashes before it actually goes in to crashing mode etc).

I have uploaded all three crash dumps from my ‘source sdk base 2007’ folder to this post.

EDIT: I repeatedly tried it again and was eventually able to do it.

EDIT 2: I forgot to mention that it also sometimes crashed when I died during the battle (it could be just me, but it seemed it crashed most often if I killed myself with the RPG).

On a related note, when I was directing a fired missile with the RPG, if I moved the red dot over a rock I was crouched right behind, the rocket seemed to appear directly in front of me instantly and spasm around wildly before eventually exploding in what I guess would have been the normal time for it to actually fly from where it was to where I was.

I hope this helps.
